messages.message: Another nit-pick: adding users to workspace - only happens when you have a long list of users showing. I can’t navigate to the “Users” input box. Nor can I a `add members` primary button at the bottom of the modal
cc @Xindi Xu not super high pri, but good feedback to consider!
We are building a new version of this modal. One thing that we do is to make the modal not close able when clicking outside, so that the user can click anywhere to close the dropdown
Yeah I'll sneak a change to not close this modal on click outside today! That should make it a little safer. I also want to see if I can make the modal not close on escape when this list is open
